column2: "EWURADZE atsɛmbusɛm a ɔfa Israel ho. Mbrɛ EWURADZE a ɔtserɛw sorsor mu
column4: na ɔbɔ nyimpa no sunsum wɔ no mu no

column3: mebɛyɛ Jerusalɛm ntentan kɔɔpow ama aman a etwa ehyia ho nyina
column4: na Jerusalɛm no ntuae no bɛka Juda so."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba wɔ da no mu dɛ mebɛyɛ Jerusalɛm ɔbo durdur mama aman nyina; hɔn a wɔdze bɔsoa hɔnho nyina bepirapira; na asaase do amanaman nyina bɔboa hɔn ano aba no do."

column5: na medze abɔdam abɔ hɔn do atsefo: na mubobue m'enyi wɔ Juda fi do
column6: na medze enyifura abɔ aman no mpɔnkɔ nyina."

column2: "Na Juda ebusuakuw bɛse wɔ hɔn akoma mu dɛ
column3: Jerusalɛm atsefo hɔn ahoɔdzen wɔ dɔm EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn no mu."

column2: "Da no mu na mebɛyɛ Juda ebusuakuw dɛ gyasɛn wɔ nyena mu na gyatsɛn wɔ efiefi mu; na wɔahyew aman a etwa ho ehyia no wɔ bankum na nyimfa: na Jerusalɛm bɛda ho atsena ne tsenabea bio
"EWURADZE so bedzi kan agye Juda asese nkwa
column3: amma David fie enyimnyam na Jerusalɛm atsefo hɔn enyimnyam aammema hɔnho do ammbɔ Juda do."

column2: "Da no mu no EWURADZE botwitwa agye Jerusalɛm atsefo; na nyia ɔyɛ mberɛw wɔ hɔn mu wɔ da no mu no ayɛ dɛ David; na David fie bɛyɛ dɛ Nyankopɔn
column3: dɛ EWURADZE bɔfoe a odzi hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba wɔ da no mu dɛ mobɔhwehwɛ amanaman a wɔbaa Jerusalɛm do nyina masɛɛ hɔn."
"Na mubohue adom na ntotɔserɛ sunsum egu David fi na Jerusalɛm atsefo do; na wɔbɔhwɛ ɔno a wɔwɔɔ no peaa no: na woesu no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ obi su ne ba kor

column4: dɛ Hadadrim-mon ewuotwa wɔ Megiddon bɔnsa mu."

column3: ebusua biara no nko; David fie ebusua nko
column4: na hɔn yernom nko; Natan fie ebusua nko

column3: na hɔn yernom nko; Simei ebusua nko
